name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Final Pick on Realtor.com - Compare listings

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a compare button to Realtor pages to compare listings and make final pick easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Final Pick is a simple app designed to choose the perfect real estate. The app aims to solve the problem of overwhelming options and difficulty in making a final decision, which can often lead to indecisiveness and hesitation.

The app's main feature is adding a "Compare" button to property pages. With this button, users can easily compare multiple listings side by side and evaluate their core parameters, prioritize listings up and down, make personal notes for each, and send their list to friends and partners.
